newsitem.title: USA: PDK Labs sets new pfd swap rate, buyback.
newsitem.headline: PDK Labs sets new pfd swap rate, buyback.

text.p: PDK Labs Inc said Monday its board of directors increased the conversion rate of the company's Series A convertible preferred stock to 1.5 shares of common stock from three-tenths of a common share.
The new terms will last until September 3, when the rate returns to the previous level of three-tenths of a share, the company said in a press release.
PDK Labs said it may extend the special coversion rate, but is under no obligation to do so.

The company also announced its board approved the repurchase of up to an additional $1 million worth of its own common stock. As of July 21, the company has repurchased, under an existing share-repurchase plan, some 178,000 shares of its common stock for a total of about $950,000.
